nodes.text: Kristiss was a female Petrusian who led a group of resistance fighters and smugglers against the Galactic Empire on Kullgroon. Kristiss and her crew worked together on freeing her father, Rythus, and other slaves at the Imperial outpost on Kullgroon. Her father urged Kristiss to get him and the other slaves weapons so they could overtake the outpost's stormtrooper security force before more arrived. After losing contact with her father, Kristiss knew her crew would need help in smuggling weapons past the Imperial stormtroopers.
Kristiss decided to ask the smuggler, Captain Lando Calrissian to help them, despite not being cheap. She then went to Batuv to find Calrissian.
